summary: Created comprehensive fix solution for React Error #31 (Objects are not valid as a React child). Generated automated fix script (fix-react-error-31.sh) that SSHs to remote server, creates safe rendering utility, fixes all identified files (BasicInformationForm.js, Menu.js, ProfileTabPopover.js, WalletBoxComponent.js), and provides search for additional issues. Also created detailed manual fix guide (REACT_ERROR_31_FIX_GUIDE.md) and quick execution script (quick-fix-react-error.sh). The solution addresses Formik helperText objects, menu name rendering, balance display, and provides reusable safe rendering utilities.
current_status: Fix scripts and documentation ready. User can execute ./fix-react-error-31.sh to automatically apply all fixes to remote React application, or follow manual guide for step-by-step fixes. Script includes backup functionality, Node.js-based pattern matching for complex replacements, and automatic utility creation. Ready for execution on remote server at 193.162.129.214.
